text: â€œMoi jane tumikhan kote thaki ase, jun jagate Saitan laga singhason ase ta te. Hoile bhi tumikhan moi laga naam to loi thake aru tumikhan moi uporte biswas thaka bhi inkar kora nai. Tumikhan eneka he thakise, Moi laga gawahi aru ekjon biswasi Antipas laga homoi te bhi, jun tumikhan majot te morai dise, jun jagate Saitan thake.
